meanings.definition: The quality or state of being regenerated.
meanings.sent1: The regenerateness of the forest after the fire was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The regenerateness of the soil was evident after the heavy rainfall.
meanings.sent3: The regenerateness of the old car surprised everyone when it started without any issues.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a regenerateness that brought warmth to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The regenerateness of the plant, growing back stronger after being pruned, was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The act of regenerating or the process of being regenerated.
meanings.sent1: The regenerateness of the cells in the body is crucial for healing.
meanings.sent2: The regenerateness of the skin after a cut is fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent3: The regenerateness of the battery allowed the toy to work again.
meanings.sent4: The regenerateness of the city, rebuilding after the disaster, was a symbol of resilience.
meanings.sent5: The regenerateness of the river, flowing freely after the dam was removed, brought life back to the ecosystem.
